apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji beautifully illustrates a couple embracing, with one person having a medium-light skin tone and the other a medium-dark skin tone, all rendered with Apple's signature 3D glossy shading and soft, rounded edges. A glowing red heart floats between them, symbolizing love, connection, and affection with a warm, inviting radiance. On Apple devices, this emoji conveys deep emotional bonds and harmonious relationships.
